attributes.action: pass a law stating that all adults over the age of 18 (and in good mental health) should own a dog.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Owning dogs make you a kind, calm person and teaches you how to love.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
